mapper.select: SELECT g_balance FROM groups g INNER JOIN group_account ga ON g.group_account = ga.group_account INNER JOIN account a ON g.account_num = a.account_num WHERE g.account_num IN (SELECT account_num FROM account WHERE account_id = #{memberId})
mapper.insert: insert into group_account(g_account_id, group_account, g_month, g_day, g_dues, g_autopay, group_pw, g_date) values (g_account_id_seq.nextval, #{group_account}, #{g_month}, #{g_day}, #{g_dues}, #{g_autopay},#{group_pw},SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT g.group_id AS group_id,g.account_num AS account_num, ga.group_account AS group_account, g_date, a.account_bank FROM groups g INNER JOIN group_account ga ON g.group_account = ga.group_account INNER JOIN account a ON g.account_num = a.account_num WHERE g.account_num IN (SELECT account_num FROM account WHERE a.account_id = #{memberId})

SELECT g.group_id AS group_id, g.group_name AS group_name, g.group_type AS group_type, g.group_account AS group_account, g.account_num AS account_num, g.group_use AS group_use FROM groups g JOIN account a ON g.account_num = a.account_num WHERE a.account_id = #{memberId} AND g.group_use = 0
select group_pw from group_account g join groups g1 on g.group_account = g1.group_account where g1.group_id = #{groupId}
